ygData.subject: Re: Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, does this mean my cleric friend (who picked up a gypsy lute when I wasn t there) could give the lute to the NPC, and I could give the NPC the carapace
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 5 Jan 2000, Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
>
> It is a bug of a sort. Here is what happens: Lets say a quest requires 3
> items (X, Y, & Z). Player 1 gives the NPC items X, Y, and a third item that
> is incorrect. Swears up & down at his bad fortune and stomps off. Player 2
> comes up and gives the NPC item Z and gets the goods, and since she also
> gave the NPC items X & Y gets the "you have something else for me?" message.

Hmm, does this mean my cleric friend (who picked up a gypsy
lute when I wasn't there) could give the lute to the NPC, and
I could give the NPC the carapace and ruby lambent, and I
would get the breastplate?

Do I really want to try this experiment considering it took me
3 days to get that damn carapace? Anyone know of a similar,
easier quest we could test this theory on first?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
